entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
